name: Dragon Scion: Fighter 8 / Bard 2 / Red Dragon Disciple 10
author: KailPendragon

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
Here we have a strong warrior build combining the fighting prowess of the fighter with RDD "epic" boni and rounded off with bardic skills. It's a pretty solid meleer who can solo with ease. See Dragon Spawn for the option to go Bard 4/FTR 6 and get more skilldumps together with two 1st lvl spells and a slightly more powerful bard song with two additional uses/day at the cost of one combat feat.

******************************

******************************

Advantages
•Excellent AB
•Good AC
•Versatile fighter with Blind Fight, IC, IKD, Imp. Disarm, Expertise, PA, Cleave, Called Shot
•Nice HPs
•Good damage output with 30 STR, WS and a 2-hander
•Improved Disarm will grant +4 effective AB vs small weapons, +8 effective AB vs tiny weapons
•UMD
•Taunt
•Minor bardic spellpower/song
•Good Fort save
•Good to decent saves vs spells
•RDD immunitites and breath weapon

Weaknesses
•Could use more skillpoints
•Low Ref save
•Natural access only to bardic cantrips
•Only 2 bardic skilldumps levels

******************************
